report.title: Record data for record details
report.description: Report used to retrieve details of a record excluding custom attributes for the record details 2 prebuilt form.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences co join occurrences o on o.id=co.id and o.deleted=false join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=co.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join users u on u.id=o.created_by_id join people p on p.id=u.person_id left join licences l on l.id=s.licence_id and l.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# where co.id=#occurrence_id#

param.name: occurrence_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence to load

param.name: geom_precision
param.join: join map_squares msq on msq.id = co.map_sq_#geom_precision#km_id
join map_squares msq on msq.id = co.map_sq_1km_id

column.name: taxon
column.sql: case co.zero_abundance when true then '<span class="zero-abundance">' || co.taxon || '<span> - zero abundance found' else co.taxon end

column.name: preferred_taxon
column.sql: CASE co.preferred_taxon WHEN co.taxon THEN null ELSE co.preferred_taxon END

column.name: inputter
column.sql: case p.surname || case when p.first_name is null or p.first_name='' then '' else ', ' || p.first_name end when co.recorders then null else p.surname || case when p.first_name is null or p.first_name='' then '' else ', ' || p.first_name end end

column.name: record_status
column.sql:
CASE WHEN co.record_status='V' AND co.record_substatus=1 THEN 'Accepted as correct' WHEN co.record_status='V' AND co.record_substatus=2 THEN 'Accepted as considered correct' WHEN co.record_status='V' THEN 'Accepted' WHEN co.record_status='C' AND co.record_substatus=3 THEN 'Plausible' WHEN co.record_status='C' THEN 'Awaiting review' WHEN co.record_status='D' THEN 'Queried' WHEN co.record_status='I' THEN 'Data entry in progress' WHEN co.record_status='R' AND co.record_substatus=4 THEN 'Rejected as unable to verify' WHEN co.record_status='R' AND co.record_substatus=5 THEN 'Rejected as incorrect' WHEN co.record_status='R' THEN 'Rejected' END || CASE WHEN co.query='Q' AND co.query IS NOT NULL AND co.record_status<>'V' THEN '
Queried.' ELSE '' END

column.name: sensitive
column.sql: CASE WHEN co.sensitivity_precision IS NOT NULL THEN 'This record is sensitive' ELSE '' END

column.name: sample_comment
column.sql: case when o.sensitivity_precision is null then s.comment else null end

column.name: geom
column.sql: case '#geom_precision#' when '' then st_astext(co.public_geom) else st_astext(msq.geom) end
